author: bridge-bot
content: <glamperd> I put together some notes on a proposal for contributor identification + anti-sybil here: https://pse-team.notion.site/Contributor-Identification-bd2824138a5f446785fdd70c60684176 TLDR: Use ETH address; enforce nonce >= 3; use ENS names if available.

author: bridge-bot
content: <trent_vanepps> > <trent_vanepps>  thanks for writing this up! (re @glamperd: I put together some notes on a proposal for contributor identification + anti-sybil here: https://pse-team.notion.site/Contributor-Identification-bd2824138a5f446785fdd70c60684176 TLDR: Use ETH address; enforce nonce >= 3; use ENS names if available.)

author: bridge-bot
content: <glamperd> Also: here's a proposal for queuing:  https://pse-team.notion.site/Queue-Strategy-c75120ae0c584e6f8db7738c9aaf963a

author: albusdompeldorius
content: Is the KZG-ceremony going to be a one-time thing, or are there plans of continuing the ceremony for future hard-forks? Just wondering in case someone missed the ceremony and still want to be 100% sure the waste is disposed by joining themselves.

author: trent_vanepps
content: currently, we're only planning to run one ceremony with as broad a participation as possible.
